content:
This wednesday, September 8, Alain Connes is giving a crash course on noncommutative geometry.

Title: A crash course on NCG, from Heisenberg to foliations, time, the quantized calculus and the paradigm of spectral geometry
Speaker: Alain Connes (College de France and IHES)
Time: September 8, 2021, 15:00 CEST
No registration needed, link to zoom session here.

Description: It will be a relaxed style expository lecture where ideas will be emphasized rather than technicalities.

The lecture is part of both the Global Noncommutative Geometry Seminar (Americas) and the conference "Baby Steps Beyond the Horizon: Mathematics for Students".

Yes, I believe the video will be published on the same webpage here and on the YouTube channel of the Global Noncommutative Geometry Seminar.

The lecture by Alain Connes from last Friday is already made public, it is a sequel in some sense to today's crash course.
